description:
(i) A dip tube, <<with removable cap>>, of internal diameter of not less than <<dip tube diameter>> millimetres shall be installed in the borehole so that a cable dipper can be lowered so as to be capable of measuring the water level without fouling any installed equipment.

(ii) Should it become necessary to remove the dip tube to facilitate maintenance work, repair work or replacement of equipment, the Licence Holder shall replace the dip tube immediately on completion of the work.
